centralQuestion: Should governments implement universal basic income?

reasons.description: Helps cushion economic disruption from AI-driven job losses.

sources.title: Business Insider: "Will AI replace human jobs and make universal basic income necessary? Here's what AI leaders have said about UBI."

reasons.description: Reduces poverty and financial stress for vulnerable populations.

sources.title: The Sun: "Americans being sent 'automatic' checks up to $500 - there's no strings attached..."

reasons.description: Could significantly reduce poverty at national level (e.g., Canada estimate).

reasons.description: Pilot programs empower recipients and encourage better decision-making.
